p: Titanyl sulfate (TiOSO 4, 93%) was purchased from Shanghai Macklin Biochemical Co., Ltd. (Shanghai, China). Ammonium hydroxide solution (NH 3·H 2O, 25%–28%), ethanol anhydrous (99.5%), ferric chloride hexahydrate (FeCl 3·6H 2O, 99.0%) and other chemicals were obtained from Tianjin Guangfu Fine Chemical Research Institute (Tianjin, China). All reagents were used without any additional purification, and all stock and working solutions were prepared in deionized water.
